title: Chairperson of Presidential Remuneration Commission steps down (The Presidency of the Republic of South Africa) ...
text: ( Source : The Presidency of the Republic of South Africa ) 15 October 2015 President Jacob Zuma has accepted the request of former Chief Justice Sandile Ngcobo to be relieved of his duties as chairperson of the Commission of Inquiry into the
